PARAMETERS: [DPad] or Up/Down Arrows - Select a scenario|[A] or Enter - Run the query|[X] or 'E' - Send game play event|[Y] or 'T' - Toggle Leaderboard type|[LB][RB] or Left/Right Arrows - Leaderboard / Stats Query|[View] or Esc Exit

#ITEM: # Indicator for which leaderboard query type (global or social)
